Utilities

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utilities.Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the game level class. It simply contains the number of enemies, their velocity, and their bullets' velocity. Every level have different collection of numbers. The higher the number of enemies, the more difficult the game will be and so on for other variables.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    FarisAlasmary
